column5: Open seat for salmon or muskie tomorrow - August 7. I'll be leaving from London and heading east or west, not sure yet.  Muskie trip will be to Lake St. Clair with some early bass and walleye fishing followed by muskie trolling. No muskie gear necessary but bring bass/walleye gear.  Salmon trip will be Lake Ontario from Oakville harbour. No salmon gear required.  Either trip, I plan to be off the water early afternoon.
Hey Brian.  Wish I could accompany you.  Got that damn thing called work in the way lol  Hope you find someone to go with!!!
I am in your area SlowPoke and wish I had the day off. Either option would be  awesome to me. Never fished either of those waters! Or musky.  Great offer you have out to OFCers.
Stocking up on camping gear tomorrow, great offer!
Oh man just got home & noticed this, Would've been perfect but my plans are Lake Huron with a buddy, Darn, Great Offer Tight Lines SBK
Hey Brian if your going for Salmon and have a seat free i can pay for the gas?  let me know
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAH  what a dope...just realized todays the 7th...DA
